pull_request.title: Added example scripts that use the Gazebo Harness plugin with Atlas v1

update.description:
This pull request is purely for demonstration purposes.

[Gazebo Harness plugin pr](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2346)

[Gazebo ROS pkgs pr](https://github.com/ros-simulation/gazebo_ros_pkgs/pull/462)

Usage:

1. `roslaunch drcsim_gazebo atlas_harnessed.launch`

2. Wait for Atlas to become unpinned and standing.

3. Raise Atlas up: `rostopic pub /atlas/harness/velocity std_msgs/Float '{data: 0.1}'`

4. Lower Atlas down: `rostopic pub /atlas/harness/velocity std_msgs/Float '{data: -0.1}'`
update.title: Added example scripts that use the Gazebo Harness plugin with Atlas v1

content.raw:
confirmed working with below
~~~
rostopic pub /atlas/harness/velocity std_msgs/Float32 '{data: 0.1}
rostopic pub /atlas/harness/detach std_msgs/Bool '{data: true}'
~~~
content.html:
confirmed working with below

rostopic pub /atlas/harness/velocity std_msgs/Float32 '{data: 0.1}
rostopic pub /atlas/harness/detach std_msgs/Bool '{data: true}'

content.raw:
actually running into a bug this morning after re-compile, gazebo crashes on startup for me :

~~~
$ roslaunch drcsim_gazebo atlas_harnessed.launch gzname:="gzserver_gdb" extra_gazebo_args:="--verbose"

...

gzserver: /usr/include/boost/smart_ptr/shared_ptr.hpp:653: typename boost::detail::sp_member_access<T>::type boost::shared_ptr<T>::operator->() const [with T = gazebo::physics::ODEPhysics; typename boost::detail::sp_member_access<T>::type = gazebo::physics::ODEPhysics*]: Assertion `px != 0' failed.

Program received signal SIGABRT, Aborted.
[Switching to Thread 0x7fff52bfb700 (LWP 10712)]
0x00007ffff68b3cc9 in __GI_raise (sig=sig@entry=6) at ../nptl/sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c:56
56	../nptl/sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c: No such file or directory.
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00007ffff68b3cc9 in __GI_raise (sig=sig@entry=6) at ../nptl/sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c:56
#1  0x00007ffff68b70d8 in __GI_abort () at abort.c:89
#2  0x00007ffff68acb86 in __assert_fail_base (fmt=0x7ffff69fd830 "%s%s%s:%u: %s%sAssertion `%s' failed.\n%n", 
    assertion=assertion@entry=0x7ffff604c840 "px != 0", file=file@entry=0x7ffff604c9a8 "/usr/include/boost/smart_ptr/shared_ptr.hpp", 
    line=line@entry=653, 
    function=function@entry=0x7ffff60566e0 <boost::shared_ptr<gazebo::physics::ODEPhysics>::operator->() const::__PRETTY_FUNCTION__> "typename boost::detail::sp_member_access<T>::type boost::shared_ptr<T>::operator->() const [with T = gazebo::physics::ODEPhysics; typename boost::detail::sp_member_access<T>::type = gazebo::physics::O"...) at assert.c:92
#3  0x00007ffff68acc32 in __GI___assert_fail (assertion=0x7ffff604c840 "px != 0", 
    file=0x7ffff604c9a8 "/usr/include/boost/smart_ptr/shared_ptr.hpp", line=653, 
    function=0x7ffff60566e0 <boost::shared_ptr<gazebo::physics::ODEPhysics>::operator->() const::__PRETTY_FUNCTION__> "typename boost::detail::sp_member_access<T>::type boost::shared_ptr<T>::operator->() const [with T = gazebo::physics::ODEPhysics; typename boost::detail::sp_member_access<T>::type = gazebo::physics::O"...) at assert.c:101
#4  0x00007ffff5ea96aa in boost::shared_ptr<gazebo::physics::ODEPhysics>::operator-> (this=<optimized out>)

#5  0x00007ffff5f083e8 in operator-> (this=0x7fff1f9ed508) at /home/hsu/projects/gazebo_7/gazebo/physics/ode/ODELink.cc:85
#6  gazebo::physics::ODELink::Init (this=0x7fff1f9ed010) at /home/hsu/projects/gazebo_7/gazebo/physics/ode/ODELink.cc:68
#7  0x00007ffeeb3c4e75 in gazebo::HarnessPlugin::Load (this=this@entry=0x7fff1f9eb8d0, _model=..., _sdf=...)
    at /home/hsu/projects/gazebo_7/plugins/HarnessPlugin.cc:79
#8  0x00007ffeeb5eee9a in gazebo::GazeboRosHarness::Load (this=0x7fff1f9eb8d0, _parent=..., _sdf=...)
    at /home/hsu/projects/indigo/catkin_gazebo_ros_pkgs/src/gazebo_ros_pkgs/gazebo_plugins/src/gazebo_ros_harness.cpp:50
#9  0x00007ffff5fec3fe in gazebo::physics::Model::LoadPlugin (this=this@entry=0x7fff1c1b2070, _sdf=...)

#10 0x00007ffff5ff1245 in gazebo::physics::Model::LoadPlugins (this=0x7fff1c1b2070)

(gdb)

pull_request.title: Added example scripts that use the Gazebo Harness plugin with Atlas v1

update.description:
This pull request is purely for demonstration purposes.

[Gazebo Harness plugin pr](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2346)

[Gazebo ROS pkgs pr](https://github.com/ros-simulation/gazebo_ros_pkgs/pull/462)

Usage:

1. `roslaunch drcsim_gazebo atlas_harnessed.launch`

2. Wait for Atlas to become unpinned and standing.

3. Raise Atlas up: `rostopic pub /atlas/harness/velocity std_msgs/Float '{data: 0.1}'`

4. Lower Atlas down: rostopic pub /atlas/harness/velocity std_msgs/Float '{data: -0.1}'`
update.title: Added example scripts that use the Gazebo Harness plugin with Atlas v1

pull_request.title: Added example scripts that use the Gazebo Harness plugin with Atlas v1

update.description:
This pull request is purely for demonstration purposes.

[Gazebo Harness plugin pr](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2346)

[Gazebo ROS pkgs pr](https://github.com/ros-simulation/gazebo_ros_pkgs/pull/462)

Usage:

1. `roslaunch drcsim_gazebo atlas_harnessed.launch`

2. Wait for Atlas to become unpinned and standing.

3. Raise Atlas up: `rostopic pub /atlas/harness/velocity std_msgs/Float '{data: 0.1}'`

4. Lower Atlas down: rostopic pub /atlas/harness/velocity std_msgs/Float '{data: -0.1}'`
update.title: Added example scripts that use the Gazebo Harness plugin with Atlas v1

pull_request.title: Added example scripts that use the Gazebo Harness plugin with Atlas v1

update.description:
This pull request is purely for demonstration purposes.

[Gazebo Harness plugin pr](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2346)

[Gazebo ROS pkgs pr](https://github.com/ros-simulation/gazebo_ros_pkgs/pull/462)

Usage:

1. `roslaunch drcsim_gazebo atlas_harnessed.launch`

2. Wait for Atlas to become unpinned and standing.

3. Raise Atlas up: `rostopic pub /atlas/harness/velocity std_msgs/Float '{data: 10.0}'`

4. Lower Atlas down: rostopic pub /atlas/harness/velocity std_msgs/Float '{data: -10.0}'`
    - note that atlas will no longer stand properly. This is purely for demonstration purposes.
update.title: Added example scripts that use the Gazebo Harness plugin with Atlas v1
